description: HTML source for a web-based database viewer interface, including styles and client-side scripting for fetching and displaying database, table, and data information.

methods.name: loadDatabases
methods.description: Fetches the list of databases from the backend API and populates the sidebar.

methods.name: refreshDatabases
methods.description: Refreshes the database list, resets current selections, and updates UI.

methods.name: toggleDatabase
methods.description: Expands or collapses a database's table list, fetching tables if needed.

methods.name: loadTables
methods.description: Fetches and displays the list of tables for a selected database.

methods.name: loadTableData
methods.description: Retrieves data for a selected table and renders it within the main content area.

methods.name: renderTable
methods.description: Constructs an HTML table from data records, handling wide content and adding interactive cells.

methods.name: renderCell
methods.description: Renders individual cell content, including handling objects, long strings, and nulls.

methods.name: expandCell
methods.description: Expands or collapses cell content to show full text or JSON.
